info.name: Snow Leopard menus
info.description:
This style changes the menus to closely mimic the look of the dock menus in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658
style 45720
info.additionalInfo:
*** UPDATES ***

11-29-12: Updated with a possible fix for a extra shadow on Windows
09-03-12: Added Firefox 15 support.
07-19-12: Fixed a few bugs with the CSS syntax.
07-23-11: Updated scroll arrows to be easier to see.
03-28-11: Fixed a bug in which the checkmark would not show.
03-11-11: Updated style to work with Firefox 4 App Menu.
03-11-10: Minor changes, including a few color adjustments.
02-21-10: Appearance revamp: the background now exactly matches the Snow Leopard menus.
02-18-10: Updated selection. Now only fully works on Firefox 3.6.
01-15-10: Fixed bug where selection bar would not appear over folders.
01-14-10: Updated menu appearance with transparent borders.
12-13-09: Removed fixed font size.
12-10-09: Small changes to the text.
11-05-09: Minimum width has been removed, plus many minor code improvements.
10-19-09: Minor code tweaks; no visual changes.
10-10-09: MAJOR UPDATE: Keyboard navigation is now supported!
10-10-09: Minor code tweaks; no visual changes.
10-02-09: Changed checkmark images to the native Mac checkmarks.
10-02-09: Fixed bug where checkmarks would not show in some menus.
09-24-09: Fixed a possible bug with menu separators.
09-19-09: Support for Graphite appearance has been added.
09-17-09: Minor code updates.
09-15-09: Removed font to improve compatibility.
09-13-09:
-- Fixed bug where checkmarks would not show in some menus.
-- Menu scrolling is now working. The menu scroll arrows have been changed to match the rest of the style.
-- Made border color slightly more white.
-- Changed font to Lucida Grande, the font used for Mac menus.
-- Rounded the menus a little more to better mimic the Snow Leopard look.
-- Changed menu checkmarks to the default Firefox checkmarks.
09-12-09: Adjusted minimum width of menus to fix a bug.

data.title: you may update the wrong style
this style can not work anymore!
Style does not work in Firefox 14.0.1
Needs an update for firfox update
